author: Simon Difford
description: Rich gin-laced Grand Marnier and tart sour lemon juice nestle harmoniously under a fluffy head.
name: Grand White Lady
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
